GET /api/users.description: Serves an array of all users

users.user_about_me: Currus texo quaerat quisquam cornu sustineo demoror usque.

GET /api/users/:user_id.description: Serves an individual user with given user_id parameter

exampleResponse.user_about_me: Currus texo quaerat quisquam cornu sustineo demoror usque.

PATCH /api/users/:user_id.description: serves a user with the value updated when given a value to be updated and a user_id parameter

DELETE /api/users/:user_id.description: serves a 204 status response when a given comment is deleted

GET /api/busks/:busk_id.description: Serves a single busk with given busk_id parameter

exampleResponse.busk_about_me: Torqueo adnuo thalassinus sonitus volubilis aggredior vito canis non. Amitto cicuta cruciamentum auctor testimonium. Ex antiquus defungo varietas caelestis voro pariatur clamo.
exampleResponse.busk_setup: Ante adimpleo vel commemoro demo ab appono volva.

DELETE /api/busks/:busk_id.description: serves a 204 status response when a given busk is deleted
